growi_settings.overwrite_documents: Imported documents will overwrite existing documents

errors.depends: '{{target}}' must be selected when '{{condition}}' is selected.

overwrite_author.label: Overwrite page's author with the current user
overwrite_author.desc: Recommended NOT to check this when users will also be restored.

set_public_to_page.label: Set 'Public' to the pages that is '{{from}}'
set_public_to_page.desc: Make sure that this configuration makes all '{{from}}' pages readable from ANY users.

initialize_meta_datas.label: Initialize page's like, read users and comment count
initialize_meta_datas.desc: Recommended NOT to check this when users will also be restored.

initialize_hackmd_related_datas.label: Initialize HackMD related data
initialize_hackmd_related_datas.desc: Recommended to check this unless there is important drafts on HackMD.

overwrite_author.label: Overwrite revision's author with the current user
overwrite_author.desc: Recommended NOT to check this when users will also be restored.

page_skip: Pages with a name that already exists on GROWI are not imported
